mapper.select: /* OtherTmembership.searchTMembershipUseStatus, T맴버십 할인 사용여부 조회, 김형식/SK 플래닛, 2014-04-23 */ SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(APPLY_VALUE,'(.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)[;](.*)','\3'),'(.*)[:](.*)[:](.*)','\3'))) AS TMEMBERSHIP_DC_RATE FROM TB_CM_TENANT_SALE_POLICY WHERE 1=1 AND TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} /* INPUT 테넌트ID */ AND POLICY_ID = 'policy014'
